title: Legal Analyst
description_1: Summarize disposition transcripts and compile indices and trail material
description_2: Distribute and receive documents related to cases on hand
description_3: Provide support with the drafting of affidavits and seizure warrants

title: Legal Analyst
description_1: Act as link between the Legal team and Client Services, or other relevant units
description_2: Manage and investigate escalated user complaints and internal questions, as well as prior to Counsel Review
description_3: Be present at triage meetings to present issues and associated investigation, as required

title: Immigration Legal Assistant
description_1: Legal research on case law as related to immigration
description_2: Coordinating paperwork related to papers for immigration or citizenship, including affidavits, petitions, applications
description_3: Prepare appropriate forms regarding client matters before the Departments of Homeland Security, State, Justice and Labor.

title: Traineeship
description_1: Attended conferences held within the Organisation, sittings of the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe
description_2: Monitoring developments in the Europe region and within the European Union's institutions
description_3: Assist in the organization of workshops and seminars; Assist in overseeing maintenance and resource tools

title: International News Desk Intern
description_1: Coordinating the team of live reporters around the world, work to fact check and verify breaking news to alert across all CNN platforms
description_2: Monitoring press conferences and live events, reaching out to press offices for statements and sourcing video/images
description_3: Making sure production teams and reporters know about their upcoming live appearances and liaises with show producers to ensure these run smoothly

title: Master of Science, Program Evaluation & Data Analytics
